synopsis.text: Graduate student YungSung SONG from Tokyo University of the Arts presents an intriguing animation project, "QQQ," as part of their 2012 graduate work in the Department of Film and New Media. The story revolves around the combination of three enigmatic Qs, forming the entity known as QQQ. These curious beings are in a constant state of motion, spinning, rolling, and transforming themselves as they journey through their world. QQQ's adventures involve not just spinning and rolling, but also swinging, turning, and traveling, creating an engaging and visually captivating experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
